title: Kisses and Curses
description: Jewelry designer, Vivienne West suffers from career suicide. Every time her big break comes along, she does something to sabotage it. In an effort to revive her floundering career she pays the back taxes on a mineral rich piece of property out West. But instead of finding turquoise to start her new fall jewelry line, she meets the man of her dreams. Only hitchâ€¦he's cursed.
author: Koko Brown
